name: Small intestinal epithelium
description: Test data.  Manual copy of full production study, manually copied from staging (https: //single-cell-staging.broadinstitute.org/single_cell/study/SCP41).

Expression.name: AtlasFullLength_log2TPM.txt.gz
Expression.description: Expression matrix for cells sampled from the whole gut with full-length scRNA-seq (Figure ED2).

Expression.name: atlas_Log2Tpm_round2.txt
Expression.description: Expression matrix for cells sampled from the whole gut (Figure 1).

Expression.name: infected_samples_Log2TPM.txt.gz
Expression.description: Log 2 TPM expression from cells sampled from infected mice (Figure 6).

Expression.name: regional_sampling_Log2TPM.txt.gz
Expression.description: Expression matrix, log2(TPM+1), for cells sampled from distinct regions of small intestine (Figure 2).

Cluster.name: Atlas of epithelial cells (Figure 1)
Cluster.description: Figure 1b: A single-cell expression survey of IECs, n=6 mice

Cluster.name: Infection with enteric pathogens (Figure 6)
Cluster.description: Figure 6a: Epithelial response to pathogen infections (changes in composition).

Cluster.name: Regional diversity of IECs (Figure 2)
Cluster.description: Figure 2a: Regional variation in cell type and differentiation.

Cluster.name: Regional diversity of IECs (Figure 2c)(DC)
Cluster.description: Figure 2c: Regional variation in cell type and differentiation (Diffusion components).
